MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the G1 postcode area of Glasgow. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 10pm. We are aware of the previous power cuts affecting your area and we apologise for this. Our engineers are on their way to the local substation to investigate and repair the fault. Our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 1AM. Once they arrive, or when we receive any update regarding the cause, we will be able to provide you with more information. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 11.31PM on 25th January 2021.
